content.question: At what time in the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>18</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAE@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, if any, is the car's velocity equal to zero? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: At what time in the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>18</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAE@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, if any, is the car's velocity equal to zero? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
